caption.title: Retraction dynamics and expansion of the distribution area of Ceratophrys calcarata according to the niche modeling method.
caption.p: Last interglacial (A); Last glacial maximum (B) and Current (C). (A): 7,287 km2; (B): 27,623 km2 and (C): 7,298 km2. Training data: AUC = 0.996 (A); AUC = 0.991 (B) and AUC = 0.997 (C). Test data: AUC = 1:00 (A); AUC = 0.710 (B) and AUC = 0.997.
Click here for additional data file.
